        public void initPingHandler(int timeout)

        Parameters:

      • handlePings

        public int handlePings(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel chnl,
                       com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Handles the ping processing for a channel.

        1. Sends a ping to the remote (connection) if the next local ping time has expired and a local message was not sent to the remote (connection).
        2. Checks if a ping has been received from the remote (connection) within the next receive ping time.
        Parameters:
        chnl - The channel to handle pings for.
        error - Error information when send ping fails.
        Returns:
        TransportReturnCodes.SUCCESS for successful sending of ping. Less than TransportReturnCodes.SUCCESS for failure.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Re-initializes ping handler for possible reuse.
